Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Card
Card class represents a single card when instantiated Deck
Deck class represents a collection of cards in a vector format. Intended to represent a deck, however can be used for stock piles, discard piles, and other uses Player
Player class represents a single player, either human or bot. Player has a name, a hand, and a score. Class does not get input from terminal directly
